Table.Actor: Pillar that expands and contracts depending on switch flag. You can change its color, size, texture and initial state with properties. Supports being rotated in all 3 axis.
Platform that follows a pathway or a position defined by rotation depending on switch flag. You can change its color, speed and initial state with properties.
Simple actor that temporarily moves the camera to its position and rotation when switch flag is enabled. Time configurable in properties.

Edit of vanilla dungeon switch: - Adds a new green/yellow crystal switch variant (use main var 0005-0006) - No cutscenes when activating switches - Toggleable crystal switches can toggle other crystal switches that share the same flag
Custom enemy that is weak to arrows and Ocarina songs
Retractable floor spikes by hiisuya, from the Hylian Modding actor pack. Can react to switch flags.
Useful for blocking players before they have the hammer.
Wooden (hookshotable) or metal (non-hookshotable) Can either fade in on switch flag, or drop to the ground when hit with bow/slingshot
Can retract on a timer and unset switch flag when fully retracted.
Can only be broken with the hammer
Slime monster that can split in two
Enemy arge insect that charges at Link
